attributes.action: stop food and drink subsidies for mp and peers
attributes.additional_details: Why do our overpaid members of parliament and house of lords get subsidised food and drink when more than  two million people have to use food banks to survive. They should live in the real world, not the cosseted world of westminister. Please stop this as soon as possible

rejection.details: Please see petition titled 'Abolish MP's Food & Drink subsidy up 20% to £6 million per annum
